title: Ticket #6528: Work to make it easier for the SWAMP  to detect stuck jobs
description:
There are various bits of work that have been requested by the SWAMP to make it easier for them to detect stuck jobs and/or personal condors.

  1. Make it so that a job cannot be submitted if it does not match any resource in the pool
  2. condor_q should have a mode where it prints out jobs that will never match any resource

They are particularly concerned with the case where the VM universe of the startd goes offline because this would result in a stuck pool for them.

Item 1 above can be solved by appropriate use of SUBMIT_REQUIREMENT(s) configuration. The trick there is to make it easy to generate the submit requirements. This will be solved by adding an output mode to condor_status that is the effective SUBMIT_REQIREMENTS expressions to duplicate matchmaking to the aggregate STARTD ads. This should be fairly straightforward, but if not we will try something else)
